title: Day 7 - Learned about animations, chess, Angular and insurance
content:
• Today I started making looping animation. I started by watching some Youtube videos. I did make an animation but I faced difficulty in the physics part of the animation. I have completed everything except the physics part which I will solve tomorrow.
  • Today I played around 10 bullet games and analyzed them on Decode Chess. I learned a lot and now I know my mistakes in the bullet format of chess.
  • Today I set up the environment to make a project with angular. I added Bootstrap and jQuery to the application.
  • I watched the fourth episode of Understanding Insurance and today I learned about personal health insurance. It educated me about the benefits of getting health insurance early as one has to pay a lower premium for a large cover. It also discussed the points to keep in mind while buying health insurance and the tools required to select the best policy.
author: Aarush Popli
